/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, teeming with life and activity. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is a hive of movement, with cars and buses navigating their way through the urban maze. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, their facades adorned with billboards and advertisements that add a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette of grays and blacks. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
